alert.note: Alert for Macon; Schley; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Macon, central Schley and south central Taylor Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 437 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Ideal, or 10 miles northeast of Ellaville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Ideal, Bartlett and Murrays Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
